metadata.title: Work.krd - AI-Powered Resume Builder
metadata.description: Create professional resumes with AI assistance in multiple languages

hero.title: Create Your Perfect Resume with AI
hero.subtitle: Build professional resumes in minutes with our AI-powered platform. Stand out from the crowd and land your dream job.

features.title: Everything You Need to Create a Winning Resume
features.subtitle: Our platform combines AI technology with professional design to help you create the perfect resume

ai.title: AI Content Generation
ai.description: Let AI help you write compelling content for your resume

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.description: Choose from a variety of ATS-friendly templates

realtime.title: Real-time Preview
realtime.description: See changes instantly as you build your resume

export.title: PDF Export
export.description: Export your resume as PDF or share online

languages.title: Multi-language Support
languages.description: Create resumes in English, Arabic, or Kurdish

ats.title: ATS Optimization
ats.description: Ensure your resume passes applicant tracking systems

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you

manualPayment.title: Manual Payment Available!
manualPayment.description: You can upgrade your plan by sending payment through FIB or contacting our support team.

currentPlan.title: Current Plan
currentPlan.description: You are currently on the {plan} plan

fib.name: First Iraqi Bank (FIB)
fib.description: Secure local payment for Iraqi users

paymentInstructions.followSteps: Follow these simple steps to upgrade your plan

step2.title: Make Your Payment
step2.fibTitle: Follow These 4 Steps on Your FIB Mobile App
step2.step1Title: Open your FIB mobile app and log in
step2.step1Desc: Enter your username and password to access your account
step2.step2Desc: Select "To Another Account" or "إلى حساب آخر" option
step2.step3Desc: Use the copy buttons to avoid typing mistakes
step2.step4Desc: This is very important so we can identify your payment
step2.doubleCheck: Double-check everything and confirm the transfer
step2.checkDetails: Make sure all details match exactly before submitting your payment

step3.title: What Happens Next?
step3.verifyDesc: Our team checks for payments every few hours during business hours
step3.activateDesc: Usually within 24 hours, often much faster
step3.emailDesc: We'll send you an email when your {plan} plan is ready to use

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: What if I don't have a FIB account?
faq.a1: You can ask a friend or family member to send the payment for you. Just make sure to include your email in the notes.
faq.q2: How will I know my payment was received?
faq.a2: You'll receive an email confirmation when we activate your plan. You can also check your dashboard.
faq.q3: What if my payment is not processed after 24 hours?
faq.a3: Contact us at support@resumeai.app with your payment details and we'll help you immediately.

paymentInstructions.planNotFound: Plan not found. Please go back and select a valid plan.

about.title: About Work.krd
about.subtitle: We're on a mission to help job seekers in Kurdistan and the Middle East create professional resumes that stand out and land their dream jobs.

community.title: Community First
community.description: Built for the Kurdish and MENA job market with local insights and expertise.

quality.title: Quality Design
quality.description: Professional templates that meet international standards and local preferences.

innovation.title: AI Innovation
innovation.description: Cutting-edge AI technology to help you write better content faster.

success.title: Your Success
success.description: We measure our success by helping you achieve your career goals.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need help? We're here to support you on your career journey.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

placeholders.description: Describe your key responsibilities and achievements...

placeholders.achievements: Dean's List, President of Computer Science Club, Relevant coursework: Data Structures, Machine Learning

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Include both technical and soft skills relevant to your target job.

tips.title: Tip:
tips.description: Focus on skills most relevant to your target role. Include both technical and soft skills.

empty.title: No skills added yet
empty.description: Add skills to showcase your expertise

tips.title: Tip:
tips.description: Include languages relevant to your target job market and industry.

empty.title: No languages added
empty.description: Add languages to show your communication abilities

placeholders.name: E-commerce Platform
placeholders.description: Describe the project, your role, and key achievements...

empty.title: No projects added
empty.description: Add your notable projects to showcase your practical experience

tips.title: Tip:
tips.description: Include projects that demonstrate skills relevant to your target job.

empty.title: No certifications added
empty.description: Add your professional certifications to validate your expertise

tips.title: Tip:
tips.description: Include recent, relevant certifications that add value to your target role.

tips.preserve: The original photo is preserved for re-editing

professionalSummary.title: Professional Summary
professionalSummary.placeholder: Write a brief summary of your professional background, key skills, and career objectives...
professionalSummary.tip: Keep your summary concise (3-4 sentences) and focus on your unique value proposition.

pricing.title: Choose the Right Plan for You
pricing.subtitle: Start free and upgrade as you grow
pricing.manualPaymentFib: Manual payment available via FIB transfer!

switchPlans.question: Can I switch plans anytime?
switchPlans.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

languages.question: Do you support Kurdish and Arabic?
languages.answer: Yes! We fully support Kurdish Sorani, Arabic, and English with proper RTL text direction.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
freeTrial.answer: Our Free plan lets you try most features. You can upgrade anytime without losing your data.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and conditions for using Work.krd services

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Work.krd ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by these terms, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Work.krd is an AI-powered resume building platform that helps users create professional resumes. Our service includes:
features: Professional resume templates and design tools
AI-powered content generation using Google Gemini
PDF export and online sharing capabilities
Secure user account management via Clerk
Payment processing through FIB and Nasspay

registration.title: Account Registration
registration.content: You must create an account through Clerk authentication to access our resume building features. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate.

security.title: Account Security
security.content: You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. Clerk handles secure authentication. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to your account.

plans.title: Subscription Plans
plans.content: Work.krd offers both free and paid subscription plans. Paid subscriptions provide access to premium features including advanced AI content generation and additional resume templates.

processing.title: Payment Processing
processing.content: Payments are processed securely through our payment partners (FIB and Nasspay) for users in Kurdistan Region and Iraq. By subscribing to a paid plan, you authorize us to charge your payment method.

refunds.title: Refunds and Cancellation
items: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your dashboard
Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period
Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis
No refunds for partial months of service

content.title: Your Content
content.text: You retain ownership of all content you upload or create using our service, including resume data, personal information, and documents.

license.title: License to Use
license.text: By using our service, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use your content solely for the purpose of providing our services to you.

backup.title: Data Backup and Storage
backup.text: While we make reasonable efforts to backup your data, you are responsible for maintaining your own copies of important information.

acceptableUse.title: 6. Acceptable Use Policy
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use the service to:
items: Violate any laws or regulations
Infringe on intellectual property rights
Upload malicious software or harmful content
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Use the service for any commercial purpose not expressly permitted
Share false, misleading, or fraudulent information
Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers

aiContent.title: 7. AI-Generated Content
aiContent.content: Our service uses artificial intelligence to generate resume content and suggestions. You acknowledge that:
items: AI-generated content is for assistance purposes only
You are responsible for reviewing and verifying all content accuracy
We do not guarantee the quality or suitability of AI-generated content
Final resume content and accuracy is your responsibility

intellectualProperty.title: 8. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Work.krd service, including its design, functionality, and content (excluding user-generated content), is owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws.
intellectualProperty.templates: Our resume templates and design elements are licensed for use within our platform only. You may not extract, reproduce, or distribute our templates outside of the service.

warranties.title: 9. Disclaimer of Warranties
warranties.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR COMPLETELY SECURE.

liability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES RESULTING FROM YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the service at our sole discretion, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.
termination.effect: Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately, and we may delete your account and data.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Kurdistan Region of Iraq, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 14. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and handle your personal information

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Work.krd ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our AI-powered resume building services.

personal.title: Personal Information
items: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
Account credentials managed securely through Clerk authentication
Professional information (work history, education, skills, resume content)
Payment information (processed securely by FIB and Nasspay payment providers)

usage.title: Usage Data
items: IP address and browser information
Pages visited and time spent on our service
Device information and operating system
Resume creation and export activities
AI content generation usage patterns

dataUsage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
items: Provide, operate, and maintain our AI-powered resume building services
Process your account registration and authentication through Clerk
Generate AI-powered resume content and suggestions using Google Gemini
Process payments securely through FIB and Nasspay
Send you service notifications, updates, and support messages via email
Respond to your contact form submissions and support requests
Improve our website and services based on usage analytics
Provide multi-language support (English, Arabic, Kurdish)

dataSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

circumstances.title: Service Providers
circumstances.content: With Clerk (authentication), Google Gemini (AI services), FIB/Nasspay (payments), and Resend (email services)

circumstances.title: Legal Compliance
circumstances.content: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety

circumstances.title: Business Transfers
circumstances.content: In connection with any merger, sale, or acquisition of our business

circumstances.title: Consent
circumstances.content: With your explicit consent for other purposes

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Our data is securely stored and transmitted using industry-standard encryption. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

userRights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights: Access and review your personal information
Request deletion of your account and data
Object to processing of your personal information
Data portability (receive a copy of your data)

cookies.title: 7. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences, though some features may not function properly if cookies are disabled.

thirdPartyServices.title: 8. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: Our website integrates with third-party services:

services.name: Payment Processors
services.purpose: FIB and Nasspay for secure payment processing

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

policyChanges.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
